# [FEAT] Voice/Phone Support

## Labels
`omnichannel`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement voice/phone support channel with call handling, IVR, and call-to-ticket conversion.

## Requirements

### Phone System
- Inbound call handling
- Outbound calling
- Call queuing
- IVR (Interactive Voice Response)
- Call routing
- Voicemail

### Call Features
- Call recording
- Call transcription
- Hold music
- Call transfer (warm/cold)
- Conference calling
- Callback requests

### Agent Tools
- Softphone in browser
- Click-to-call from tickets
- Call notes
- Call wrap-up codes
- Customer info pop-up
- Call history

### IVR Builder
- Visual IVR designer
- Menu options
- Business hours routing
- Skill-based routing
- Language selection
- Self-service options

### Reporting
- Call volume metrics
- Wait time statistics
- Agent talk time
- Call quality scores
- Abandoned call tracking

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk provides voice support with AI capabilities for phone-based customer service.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Calls create tickets
- [ ] IVR system works
- [ ] Call recording available
- [ ] Call routing functional
- [ ] Analytics available
